text: (he nabee!) kya aap nahin jaanate ki allaah hee ko sajda[1] karate hain, jo aakaashon tatha dharatee mein hain, soory aur chaand, taare aur parvat, vrksh aur pashu, bahut-se manushy aur bahut-se ve bhee hain, jinapar yaatana sidhd ho chukee hai. aur jise allaah apamaanit kar de, use koee sammaan dene vaala nahin hai. nihsandeh allaah karata hai, jo chaahata hai
